医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，获得城市植被可以降低儿童哮喘风险城市植被和花粉暴露与儿童哮喘发病率的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Access-to-urban-vegetation-can-mitigate-asthma-risk-for-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Access-to-urban-vegetation-can-mitigate-asthma-risk-for-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34f75828-824a-44ac-a9fe-16256dc3486a Thu, 13 Jun 2024 04:37:00 -0400 Access to urban vegetation can mitigate asthma risk for children, study finds
研究将抗抑郁药物的使用和表观遗传衰老与绝经后女性较高的死亡风险联系起来抑郁症状、抗抑郁药的使用和表观遗传年龄加速 (EAA) 对绝经后个体死亡率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-links-antidepressant-use-and-epigenic-aging-to-higher-mortality-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-links-antidepressant-use-and-epigenic-aging-to-higher-mortality-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eefb3e5a-3c1a-44f1-a08a-78657a7caede Thu, 13 Jun 2024 04:12:00 -0400 Study links antidepressant use and epigenetic aging to higher mortality risk in postmenopausal women
用轻度活动或睡眠代替看电视的时间可以提高健康衰老的几率久坐的行为会降低健康衰老的几率，而轻微的体力活动则会增加健康衰老的几率。用轻度活动、锻炼或睡眠代替看电视的时间可以提高健康衰老的几率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Replacing-TV-time-with-light-activity-or-sleep-boosts-healthy-aging-odds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Replacing-TV-time-with-light-activity-or-sleep-boosts-healthy-aging-odds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7004ae34-16ba-4836-a288-566d159136b0 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 00:23:00 -0400 Replacing TV time with light activity or sleep boosts healthy aging odds
研究证实 COVID-19 与缺血性阴茎异常勃起之间没有因果关系《国际阳痿研究杂志》上的一项研究发现，COVID-19 与缺血性阴茎异常勃起之间没有因果关系，所有 COVID-19 严重程度都会出现阴茎异常勃起，并且治疗仍然有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-confirms-no-causal-link- Between-COVID-19-and-ischemic-priapism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-confirms-no-causal-link- Between-COVID-19-and-ischemic-priapism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ceca247-21d6-4e1c-93cf-7c4824f170b0 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 00:06:00 -0400 Study confirms no causal link between COVID-19 and ischemic priapism
研究发现多奈哌齐和美金刚结合可延长阿尔茨海默病患者的生命阿尔茨海默病是世界上最常见的神经退行性疾病，影响全球超过 5000 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Combining-donepezil-and-memantine-extends-lives-of-Alzheimers-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Combining-donepezil-and-memantine-extends-lives-of-Alzheimers-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e33eb77-1e57-4bb8-a1c5-ce142f72591e Wed, 12 Jun 2024 23:52:57 -0400 Combining donepezil and memantine extends lives of Alzheimer's patients, study finds
新研究揭示了 IL-23 在慢性炎症性肠病中的作用威尔康奈尔医学院的科学家发现了调节哺乳动物免疫系统的两条关键途径之间以前未知的联系，这一发现影响了我们对慢性炎症性肠病（IBD）的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/New-research-sheds-light-on-IL-23s-role-in-chronic-itis-bowel-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/New-research-sheds-light-on-IL-23s-role-in-chronic-itis-bowel-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ee6ddf-0dcf-4cc4-95f4-96af8c83f678 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 23:48:00 -0400 New research sheds light on IL-23's role in chronic inflammatory bowel diseases
研究确定了预防脊髓损伤后自主神经功能障碍的药物靶点为了应对压力或危险的刺激，脊髓中的神经细胞会激活不自觉的自主反射，通常称为“战斗或逃跑”反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Study-identizes-drug-target-to-prevent-autonomic-dysfunction-after-spinal-cord-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Study-identizes-drug-target-to-prevent-autonomic-dysfunction-after-spinal-cord-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df1f0a2b-e13f-4ca3-aa29-12a45bf475e0 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 23:26:00 -0400 Study identifies drug target to prevent autonomic dysfunction after spinal cord injury
伦敦大学学院的研究人员发现了双相情感障碍情绪偏见背后的大脑机制伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，情绪的瞬间变化，即使只持续几秒钟，也会深刻改变双相情感障碍患者大脑对愉快经历的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/UCL-researchers-identify-brain-mechanisms-behind-mood-bias-in-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/UCL-researchers-identify-brain-mechanisms-behind-mood-bias-in-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef1586c4-81e7-4b02-a16e-14b41484cf6f Wed, 12 Jun 2024 23:22:35 -0400 UCL researchers identify brain mechanisms behind mood bias in bipolar disorder
含糖饮料会破坏唾液微生物组《科学报告》中的一项研究发现，饮用高糖饮料会导致口腔微生物群发生致病性变化，减少细菌多样性并增加产酸细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Sugary-drinks-disrupt-the-salivary-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Sugary-drinks-disrupt-the-salivary-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98c0b595-7104-4168-a821-0bc1fa5869a6 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 23:22:00 -0400 Sugary drinks disrupt the salivary microbiome
斯坦福大学研究发现 CAR-T 细胞治疗后继发性血癌的风险较低斯坦福大学医学院的研究人员进行的一项大型研究发现，CAR-T 细胞治疗后继发性血癌的风险；一种基于细胞的癌症治疗方法于 2017 年作为治疗顽固性血癌的药物而迅速流行起来；尽管食品和药物管理局发出警告，但该药物的含量仍然很低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Stanford-study-finds-low-risk-of-secondary-blood-cancers-after-CAR-T-cell-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240612/Stanford-study-finds-low-risk-of-secondary-blood-cancers-after-CAR-T-cell-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ee991c6-6626-4d06-924b-fc2d4a8a1aa0 Wed, 12 Jun 2024 23:14:23 -0400 Stanford study finds low risk of secondary blood cancers after CAR-T cell therapy
